overview: Sarah and Isolde share an interest in the traditional music and dance of the Balkans, but it turns out that shared interests donâ€™t always unite them. Their trip, initially a fun bonding experience, takes a southward turn when Sarah becomes interested in handsome fellow camper Steph. A seemingly innocent romantic overture touches off an abrupt shift in the dynamic between the two girlfriends, steering a previously ecstatic camp outing down a psychological rabbit hole.
title: Butter on the Latch
